Comment.Language: For the Commemoration of St. Cyril of Alexandria:

Text.Language: <ere peniwt eyouab: m~patriar,/c: abba Kurilloc pic~tulloc n~te pinah]:” pimenrit n~te P,#c#.
Hail to our holy father, the patriarch, Abba Cyril the Pillar of the Faith, the beloved of Christ.
السلام لك يا ابانا القديس البابا انبا كيرلس عمود الايمان حبيب المسيح
